introduction: Kaynipa POLNIKORNEarned a Master degree of Media Arts in Film Production from University of Technology Sydney in 2004, she worked as a script assistant to Ekachai Uekrongtham’s <Pleasure Factory>(2008) and <Bare>(2012). Her short film, <The Tree>(2010) has been invited to Hong Kong International Film Festival, Montreal World Film Festival, Thai Short Film and Video Festival. Her feature project <Palung>(2012) has been selected for project market (Co-FPC) at the 15th Shanghai Film Festival.
